src:
Fiesta Panen Kopi dan Festival Tari Guel Semarakkan Penutupan GAMIFest 2019
05 Nov 2019, 13:03 by Alfi Sahrin


Fiesta Panen Kopi dan Festival Tari Guel Semarakkan Penutupan GAMIFest 2019

KBRN, Redelong : Gayo Mountain International Festival (GAMIFest) telah berlangsung sejak Agustus lalu yang dibuka di Kabupaten Gayo Lues dan akan kembali ditutup akhir Nopember 2019 nanti di Kabupaten Bener Meriah.
Kepala Dinas Pariwisata Bener Meriah Riswandika Putra kepada RRI menyebutkan, penutupan GAMIFest di Kabupaten kopi itu akan disemarakkan dengan kegiatan Fiesta Panen Kopi dan Festival Tari Guel.
Seiring dengan ditetapkannya pariwisata sebagai leading sector oleh Presiden, Ia berharap kegiatan itu akan dapat menjadi pemicu perkembangan wisata di dataran tinggi Gayo terutama Bener Meriah.
“Saat ini kita tengah lakukan persiapan menghadapi penutupan GAMIFest 2019 di Bener Meriah, kita berharap kegiatan ini akan menjadi pemicu masyarakat akan sadar wisata dan menarik para wisatawan untuk hadir ke Bener Meriah,” ujarnya, Selasa (5/11/2019).
Sementara itu Kabid Promosi dan Pariwisata pada Dinas Pariwisata setempat Agus Nurza Zulkarnain menyebutkan, perhelatan internasional yang berlangsung pada 21 -24 Nopember 2019 itu akan dihiasi dengan beberapa cabang kegiatan.
Dijabarkan, kegiatan itu diantaranya lomba panen kopi, lomba photo, lomba kreasi bean, atraksi pengolahan kopi tradisonal, kenduri panen kopi, eksibisi dan lomba mobil kopi serta minum kopi massal.
Ia menambahkan, fiesta itu juga akan dihiasi launching Desa Damaran Baru sebagai Eco-Village di negeri kopi berselimut kabut.
text:
Fiesta Coffee Harvest and Guel Dance Festival Enliven the 2019 GAMIFest Closing
05 Nov 2019, 13:03 by Alfi Sahrin


Fiesta Coffee Harvest and Guel Dance Festival Enliven the 2019 GAMIFest Closing

KBRN, Redelong: Gayo Mountain International Festival (GAMIFest) has been taking place since last August which opened in Gayo Lues Regency and will be closed again at the end of November 2019 later in Bener Meriah Regency.
Head of the Bener Meriah Tourism Office Riswandika Putra told RRI that the closing of GAMIFest in the coffee district would be enlivened with the Fiesta Coffee Harvest and Guel Dance Festival activities.
Along with the establishment of tourism as the leading sector by the President, he hopes that the activity will be able to trigger the development of tourism in the Gayo highlands, especially Bener Meriah.
"Currently we are doing preparations for the closure of GAMIFest 2019 in Bener Meriah, we hope this activity will be a trigger for the community to be aware of tourism and attract tourists to attend Bener Meriah," he said, Tuesday (11/05/2019).
Meanwhile Head of Promotion and Tourism at the local Tourism Office Agus Nurza Zulkarnain said, the international event which took place on 21-24 November 2019 would be decorated with several branches of activities.
Described, the activities include coffee harvesting contest, photo competition, bean creation contest, traditional coffee processing attractions, coffee harvest festivity, exhibition and coffee car competition and drinking coffee mass.
He added, the fiesta would also be decorated with the launching of Damaran Baru Village as an Eco-Village in a fog-covered coffee country.
